Is lattice corneal dystrophy type I inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder. In most cases, an affected person has one parent with the condition.",GHR,lattice corneal dystrophy type I
